mapper.select: /* etc.mng.popup.getInfo */ SELECT A.idx ,A.pup_nm ,A.pup_ctnt ,A.strt_dtm ,A.end_dtm ,A.left_pos ,A.top_pos ,A.width ,A.height ,A.prcs_yn ,CASE WHEN A.prcs_yn='Y' THEN '진행' ELSE '종료' END AS prcs_yn_nm ,A.reg_dt ,A.updt_dt ,to_char(A.reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_dt_char ,to_char(A.updt_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') updt_dt_char ,A.reg_user_id ,USR.name reg_user_name FROM kcgbd.t_pup_mng A ,kcgbd.t_user USR WHERE 1=1 AND USR.user_id = A.reg_user_id AND A.idx = #{idx}
